title: backlog prep
content:
can someone pls specify the resources to be referred for math sem 2 backlog.  
also, if you could tell me how the paper split is gonna be for cw problems, assign prob and qn bank.

thank you

comments.body: Though I’ve never written backlogs, prep should be similar to regular ESAs (I know this cause I’ve solved backlog papers when practising for ESA) so you should be good if you are thorough with all the problems solved in your class + qb + prev year ESA papers
